          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Writing Numbers 3</string>
            <string language="en">Writing Numbers 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Zahlen 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Numéros 3 D'Écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Números 3 Da Escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numeri 3 Di Scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμοί 3 γραψίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Números 3 De la Escritura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Listen to the numbers and write them in letters.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let’s Begin!</string>
            <string language="en">Listen to the numbers and write them in letters. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let's Begin!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">Numbers</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Sie zu den Zahlen und schreiben Sie sie in
Zeichen. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul
1 - lassen Sie uns anfangen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoutez les nombres et écrivez-les dans les 
lettres. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - 
le module 1 - commençons !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escute os números e escreva-os nas letras. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - o 
módulo 1 - deixe-nos começar!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ascolti i numeri e scrivali nelle lettere. 
Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 1 - 
cominciamo!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακούστε τους αριθμούς και τους γράψτε στις επιστολές. 
Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους 
αρχαρίους - ενότητα 1 - αρχίστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuche los números y escríbalos en cartas. 
¡Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - el 
módulo 1 - comencemos!</string>
          </description>
